titleStmt.title: The discourses of Cleander and Eudoxus upon the provincial letters. By a lover of peace and concord. ; Translated out of a French copy.
Réponse aux lettres provinciales. English
titleStmt.author: Daniel, Gabriel, 1649-1728.

notesStmt.note: In response to Pascal's Les provinciales.
Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in: Bodleian Library.
